00035 #define is_power_of_two(N) ((N ^ (N - 1)) == (2 * N - 1))

00042 typedef struct bmGlyph {
00043     unsigned short unicode;
00044     short locx, locy;
00045     signed char ofsx, ofsy;
00046     unsigned char sizex, sizey;
00047     unsigned char advance, reserved;
00048 } bmGlyph;
00049 
00050 typedef struct bmFont {
00051     char magic[4];
00052     short version;
00053     short glyphcount;
00054     short xsize, ysize;
00055     bmGlyph glyphs[1];
00056 } bmFont;
